1394070.name: Brock Crocodile
1394070.description:
Brock Crocodile is a 2-D platformer where you take control of the titular red croc Brock to save his home of Crocodillian Island! The wicked King Wize and his assortment of generals and goons are invading, and Brock is the unlikely but plucky hero needed to stop them. From bee-themed mecha bosses to lightning powered apes, you're going to need to be fast on your feet to survive this adventure! Explore quiet undisturbed ruins, bustling cityscapes, and secret underground volcano bases as you help Brock along on his grand journey to save his home!



As Brock, you'll be swinging through chasms and pitfalls and blasting through buildings in high speed ziplines using his trusty whip (as any self respecting archeologist would, of course!) When facing off against the hordes under King Wize's control, switch to his fruit gun and send your enemies packing with one of your “five-a-day”. Pepper your enemies with rapid-fire cherries or detonate pineapple bombs so explosive that you'll question ever putting it on your pizza!



Brock Crocodile is a love letter to mascot platformers of the 90s combined with the slapstick comedy of 80s and 90s Saturday Morning cartoons. The gameplay, graphics, music and story are all designed around late 20th century fun, so come and relive an era from the glorious past and take a trip down nostalgia lane!



Blast through Crocodillian Island's various locations - Over 10 different locales that have all the classic platformer tropes. From a magical castle with deadly morning stars and fire balls to a spiralling city with canopies and high pressure sewage systems launching Brock to new heights (Yuck - there must be a better way to travel?)

Packed full of hardcore boss fights - More than 10 different boss fights, from a fierce rival constantly stopping you in your tracks to a giant shark themed gun boat, piloted by a smaller shark.



Hidden rooms to find and treasures to collect - Each level is designed for multiple playthroughs filled with goodies and secret treasures to collect. Prove that you're the world's greatest archeologist by uncovering them all and learning the history of Crocodillian Island!



Get some R n' R at Crocoh Lake - Return to the quaint home town of our hero, Crocoh Lake, and gear up for your next adventure by visiting the item shops or perhaps have a chat with the locals!



An adventure full of charming and crazy characters - You'll meet a ninja chef, air pirates, criminal royalty, otaku inventors, totally nasty & mean turtles, and many more on your journey to stop the evil mastermind, King Wize!



A 16 bit blast from the past soundtrack - Using authentic soundchips of classic 16 bit consoles, Brock Crocodile features an FM soundtrack that fits perfectly with high flying adventure!
